summary: ITEM 1. BUSINESS Pinnacle West Pinnacle West is a holding company incorporated in Arizona that conducts business through its subsidiaries. We derive essentially all of our revenues and earnings from our wholly-owned subsidiary, APS. APS is incorporated in Arizona and is a vertically-integrated electric utility that provides either retail or wholesale electric service to most of Arizona, with the major exceptions of about one-half of the Phoenix metropolitan area, the Tucson metropolitan area and Mohave County in northwestern Arizona. Pinnacle Westâ€™s other active subsidiaries are El Dorado, an Arizona corporation, and PNW Power, a Delaware limited liability company.
